sqlMap.update: update owner_mobile_generation set update_date = now(),update_by = #updateBy# where owner_num = #ownerNum#
sqlMap.statement: delete from owner_mobile_generation where owner_num = #ownerNum#; insert into owner_mobile_generation (owner_num,create_date,create_by,update_date,update_by) values (#ownerNum#,now(),#createBy#,now(),#updateBy#)
